oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *
  FROM CD_POSMGR.LO_OWHBD
 WHERE OWHREQSYMD >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND OWHREQSYMD <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM')),'YYYYMMDD');

SELECT *
  FROM CD_POSMGR.LO_OWHBD
 WHERE OWHREQSYMD >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND OWHREQSYMD <= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE-1),'YYYYMMDD');

SELECT *
  FROM CD_POSMGR.SA_ORDDTL
 WHERE ORDYMD >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND ORDYMD <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM')),'YYYYMMDD');

SELECT *
  FROM CD_POSMGR.SA_ORDDTL
 WHERE ORDYMD >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND ORDYMD <= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE-1),'YYYYMMDD');

SELECT *
  FROM CD_WMS.IFWMSONLINE
 WHERE SYSTEM_TYPE = 'ER'
   AND SHIPPING_DATE >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND SHIPPING_DATE <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM')),'YYYYMMDD');

SELECT *
  FROM CD_WMS.IFWMSONLINE
 WHERE SYSTEM_TYPE = 'ER'
   AND SHIPPING_DATE >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND SHIPPING_DATE <= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE-1),'YYYYMMDD');

activities.name: get page
activities.description: 대표 제품의 생성 기간동안 토탈 건수

oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *
  FROM CD_DDREAM.POS_DD_SALES
 WHERE SALES_DATE >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND SALES_DATE <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM')),'YYYYMMDD');

SELECT *
  FROM CD_DDREAM.POS_DD_SALES
 WHERE SALES_DATE >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND SALES_DATE <= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE-1),'YYYYMMDD');

select to_char(min(base_date),'YYYYMMDD') AS SDATE
         ,to_char(MAX(base_date),'YYYYMMDD') AS EDATE
    from cd_ods.aps_sdc_pw_mst
   where CMONTH2 between to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1),'YYYYMM') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM')
   GROUP BY CMONTH2
   ORDER BY CMONTH2

SELECT *
 FROM CD_DDREAM.POS_DD_SALES
WHERE SALES_DATE BETWEEN '@{item().SDATE}' AND '@{item().EDATE}'

preCopyScript.value:
DELETE
    FROM CD_ODS.POS_DD_SALES
    WHERE SALES_DATE BETWEEN  '@{item().SDATE}' AND '@{item().EDATE}'

properties.description: 관세청 수출입 정보 및 환율 정

oracleReaderQuery.value: select CD_IF.FUNC_CDI_LOG(  'I' , p_pipline => 'PIP_API_INDUSTRY_KMA_WEATHER_D' ) as result from dual;
@concat('select CD_IF.FUNC_CDI_LOG(''U'' , p_seq => ''', activity('Input log').output.firstRow.RESULT, ''', p_result => ''S'') as result from dual')

@concat('select CD_IF.FUNC_CDI_LOG(''U'' , p_seq => ''', activity('Input log').output.firstRow.RESULT, ''', p_result => ''E'', p_error_msg => ''', replace(activity('PIP_API_INDUSTRY_KMA_WEATHER_D').Error.Message, '''','‘'),''') as result from dual')

activities.description: API 호출 정보를 가져오기 위해 설정 파일에서 Date 을 읽어옵니다.
